    • isGameInLibrary

      public static boolean isGameInLibrary(String gameName) throws IOException
      Method reads through the games.txt file and checks if there is a game there corresponding to the input game name.
      Parameters:
      gameName - name of the game
      Returns:
      true if there is a game in the file with that name, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException - if file could not be read.

    • isPlatformInLibrary

      public static boolean isPlatformInLibrary(String platformName) throws IOException
      Method reads through the platforms.txt file and checks if there is a platform there corresponding to the input platform name.
      Parameters:
      platformName - name of the platform
      Returns:
      true if there is a platform in the file with that name, false if not
      Throws:
      IOException - if file could not be read.
